title: Those who witness the PATCH TOOL in action report a peculiar sensationâ€”the feeling of history adjusting around them, of past events subtly rewritten while memory remains unchanged. Dot insists this is working as intended. The tool doesn't erase; it optimizes. It doesn't destroy; it refines. And in a universe governed by the Prime Directive, even the past must be efficient enough to serve the journey to the Beach.
